publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3535.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Decline of the Daily Record-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3535) in the name of Tommy Sheridan (Decline of the Daily Record), leave out from first "regrets" to end and insert "fondly remembers the Daily Record's front page portrayal of then Scottish Secretary of State, Michael Forsyth MP, as fictional murderer Freddy Kruger and accordingly believes that Peter Cox is doing an excellent job in upholding the paper's reputation for objective reporting."
